events.name: Annual Science Symposium
events.description: Join us for an exciting day of scientific presentations and research showcases from our top students and faculty members.

events.name: Cultural Festival 2025
events.description: Experience diverse cultures through music, dance, food, and art in our annual multicultural celebration.

events.name: Basketball Championship Finals
events.description: Cheer for your favorite teams in the thrilling finals of our inter-college basketball championship.

events.name: Computer Science Department Open House
events.description: Explore cutting-edge research projects and meet faculty members from the Computer Science department.

events.name: Alumni Networking Event
events.description: Connect with successful alumni and explore career opportunities in various industries.

events.name: Art Exhibition: Student Showcase
events.description: Discover amazing artwork created by our talented students across various mediums and styles.

events.name: Soccer Tournament Semifinals
events.description: Witness intense matches as teams compete for a spot in the championship finals.

events.name: Engineering Innovation Workshop
events.description: Learn about the latest innovations in engineering and participate in hands-on workshops.

events.name: Math Olympiad Prep Session
events.description: Prepare for the upcoming Math Olympiad with expert coaching and practice problems.

events.name: Research Paper Writing Workshop
events.description: Learn the essentials of writing and publishing research papers in academic journals.

events.name: Career Counseling Session
events.description: Meet professional advisors to discuss career paths and opportunities after graduation.

events.name: Drama Night: Classic Play
events.description: Enjoy an evening of theater as the drama club presents a timeless classic.

events.name: International Food Fair
events.description: Taste cuisines from around the world prepared by students and local chefs.

events.name: Music Concert: Student Bands
events.description: Listen to amazing performances by our student music bands and solo artists.

events.name: Table Tennis Open
events.description: Join the friendly competition or cheer for your peers at the table tennis open.

events.name: Swimming Gala
events.description: Watch thrilling races at our annual swimming gala featuring top athletes.

events.name: Cricket Friendly Match
events.description: A friendly cricket match between students and faculty members.

events.name: Biology Lab Open Session
events.description: Get hands-on experience with biology experiments guided by senior researchers.

events.name: Psychology Guest Lecture
events.description: Attend a talk by a renowned psychologist about mental health trends in students.

events.name: Chemistry Safety Workshop
events.description: Learn about essential lab safety practices and proper handling of chemicals.

events.name: Winter Coding Hackathon
events.description: A 12-hour hackathon where students built innovative apps and web solutions.

events.name: Spring Dance Gala
events.description: A vibrant evening of performances by the dance society and guest artists.

events.name: Tennis Championship
events.description: Exciting singles and doubles matches to crown the campus tennis champions.

events.name: Robotics Demo Day
events.description: Students showcased their autonomous robots and discussed future tech ideas.

events.name: Photography Exhibition: Campus Life
events.description: A collection of stunning photographs capturing everyday moments around campus.
